# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

Use this section to tell people about which versions of your project are currently being supported with security updates.

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 1.0.x   | :white_check_mark: |
| < 1.0   | :x:                |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you discover a security vulnerability in SpaceX Gaming Cafe Management System, please report it to us as follows:

1. **Do not** create a public GitHub issue for the vulnerability.
2. Instead, please report it via GitHub's Security Advisories feature:
   - Go to the [Security tab](https://github.com/your-username/spacex-gaming-cafe/security/advisories) in this repository
   - Click "Report a vulnerability"
   - Provide detailed information about the vulnerability

We will acknowledge receipt of your report within 48 hours and provide a more detailed response within 7 days indicating our next steps.

If the vulnerability is accepted, we will:
- Work on a fix and release it as soon as possible
- Credit you (if desired) in the release notes

If the vulnerability is declined, we will provide a clear explanation of why.

For more information, please see our [Contributing Guidelines](CONTRIBUTING.md) if available.
